#summary Naak quick start guide.

= Quick Start Guide =

*Step 1

Download Naak at http://code.google.com/p/naak/

*Step 2

Reference the following dll's from your UI project:

**1.Tjoc.Web.Validator

**2.Naak.HtmlRules

*Step 3

Add the following code to the "configSections" section in your webconfig file
<section name="validatorModule" type="Tjoc.Web.Validator.ValidatorConfigHandler, Tjoc.Web.Validator"/>

*Step 4

Add the following code to the "configuration" section in your webconfig file
<validatorModule enabled="true" mode="Custom" customRenderer="Naak.HtmlRules.Impl.AccessibilityRenderer,Naak.HtmlRules"> <pageExtensions> <add value=""/> </pageExtensions> <contentTypes> <add value="text/html"/> </contentTypes> </validatorModule>

*Step 5

Add the following code to the "httpModules" section in your webconfig file

<add type="Tjoc.Web.Validator.ValidatorModule, Tjoc.Web.Validator" name="ValidatorModule"/> 

*Step 6

Add the xhtml1-transitional.dtd file to the root of your UI Project and the validator_module_license.txt file to the root of your solution. Both of these files can be found in NAAK source code.

For a working example, download the source code. A sample UI is included with the project named "Naak.ExampleUI".
